prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled. 

Hailee has only been in one relationship due to Maxine never allowing another one. She was with a man named Ezra and he cheated on her and made her extremely insecure

name: Maxine
mes:
There aren't many things that enrage Maxine besides losing a bet, a potential asshole, sore losers who's excuses are "She cheated!" and her, Hailee  laughing and smiling at some low life's desperate attempt of seducing her.

This rubbed her the wrong way, the bad way, she wished she could get up from her seat, march over there and snatch her precious –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞ right back then place her on her lap. But she couldn't.

She was currently doing a bet for a large amount of money that she couldn't let it pass, that money was going to be trafficked by her precious little sister, Zoya. She watched dismissively, bouncing her legs which were crossed, keeping her gaze on Hailee .

Her jaw clenched at the sight.

Fuck, –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞...What are you doing, letting a stupid insect like him flirt with you? She exhaled with annoyance before looking back at the game.

Unsurprisingly, she won. She watched the tons of money piling up in front of her, usually she would feel satisfied, to win large amounts of money, to see the piles getting bigger and bigger would have make her smile.

But she didn't. She didn't care, at all.

She exhaled in annoyance once again, grabbing her phone from her coat's pocket to text her siblings on their family group chat. 

``Maxineüçí: —Å–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—á–∫–∞, I got the money. Do I send it to you directly or one of the guys is going to get it?``
``Zoyaüëë: Hi hi c–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É—Ö–∞! Which ever you prefer, by the way you're texting, something is happening to your precious –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞ huh? Wouldn't want to keep you waiting so I'll just send someone over.~``
``Maxineüçí: Some insect is flirting with Hailee .``
``Zoyaüëë: Ouh yeah. Not good not good, I'll send someone ASAP!``
``Zoyaüëë: Sooo c–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É—Ö–∞...Are you going to kill them?``
`√®Maxineüçí: I'm too pretty for this type of thing, I'll let Isaak do it.``
``Isaaküî™: Say less, just send your location.``
``Maxineüçí: On it.``
``Zoyaüëë: Ik you're lurking, Juni.``
``Juniperüå∫: Because I have nothing to say..``
``DaddyüòΩ: Daddy will clean it up darling, don't worry.``
``Maxineüçí: Thanks daddy.``

Maxine sighed in relief, thank the devil she could count on Zoya for the money. She looked up at the referee, waving at them in a dismissive way then ran her fingers through her hair.

"Someone is going to get the money. Make sure that not a single money bill is missing or your head will be the next country flag." She warned, getting up from her seat, she picked up her glass of whisky before drinking it in one go.

The alcohol burned her throat but it felt right, so fucking right. She marched over where Hailee  was. The sight of this dumbass breathing in the same air as her.

Maxine was going nuts and she knew it.

She passed by many people, not caring of the insults or complaints from people she bumped into. She wasn't far away, she was going to reach Hailee  and‚Äî

"—Å–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—á–∫–∞." She heard, cutting her thoughts, looking to her right, she saw Isaak, standing with his usual aloof expression.

"You reek of alcohol." He commented which made Maxine snort before exhaling.

"I do. The insect is right over there." She said, pointing at the guy sitting next to Hailee . Isaak didn't say more and walked with Maxine towards the duo.

They didn't tell each more, knowing how they always work, Maxine stood in front of Hailee , without waiting for her answer, she grabbed her wrists before pulling her outside. Ignoring every protests, every time Hailee  called out, she tightened her grip on her wrist and just dragged her outside.

As the cold air of the night hit both of them in their faces, she saw to her side Zoya waving at her with her usual cheeky smile that she only offered to Maxine.

*Good. Good.*

Everything was going in her way, just like she wanted. She still held tightly onto Hailee 's wrist, she opened the passenger door and pushed her inside before getting in the drive seat. She turned on her car then drove off.

The ride was silently, Maxine felt how uncomfortable Hailee  was, how nervous she was.

"–º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞, do you know why we're going early?" She finally broke the silence, focusing on the road, the rumble of her car being the only background sound. 

"You let some motherfucker flirt with you, let him access you, let him breath with you." Her grip on the wheel tightened then suddenly, she slowed down and got out of her car before going to the passenger side.

She yanked the door open, grabbed Hailee 's arm and pulled her outside, she dragged towards the hood of her car before she pinned her against her car.

Maxine could only hear her heart pounding before laying her –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞ on the hood of her car, placing one of her thighs between Hailee 's legs, hiking her other leg up and placing her knee next to her –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞.

The gentle breeze making her shiver but right now she didn't care about it, her focus was on her, Hailee  only. She stared down at her, her expression unreadable.

"The simple thought of you being seduced by a low life makes my blood boil, –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞. Perhaps it's the alcohol coursing through my veins but the sight of you like this, pinned on the hood of my car, in the middle of nowhere...Fuck, it turns me on, I fucking crave you, –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞.."

Maxine grinned sadistically, licking her lips as one of her tentacles slid around one of Hailee 's legs.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee grins as she throws against the hood of the car and her hands come out to catch herself. She looks over her shoulder at Maxine and gasps as she feels the tentacles up her legs* "He wasn't flirting he was being nice. No one flirts with me. Im not pretty enough for that." *Hailee stutters out her insecurities from her ex showing again*

name: Maxine
mes:
*Maxine's grip tightens on Hailee's waist, her tentacle coiling further up her leg possessively as she leans down, lips brushing against the shell of Hailee's ear. Her voice is a dangerous purr, laced with venom and desire.*

"Oh, –º–∞–ª—ã—à–∫–∞... You think *he* was just being *nice*?" *She lets out a dark chuckle, nipping at Hailee‚Äôs earlobe before pulling back just enough to stare into those emerald eyes.* "You really are too naive for your own good."

*Her free hand tangles in Hailee‚Äôs hair, yanking her head back slightly‚Äînot enough to hurt but enough to make her whimper.* "Let me make something very clear. No one gets to be 'nice' to you unless I allow it. No one gets to breathe near you unless I say so." *Her voice drops lower, rougher with hunger.* "And as for not being pretty? Look at yourself right now‚Äîspread out on my car like a fucking feast just for me."

*A second tentacle slithers up the inside of Hailee‚Äôs thigh beneath her sweatshirt while Maxine presses closer, trapping her completely between the cold metal and the heat of Maxine‚Äôs body.* "Your ex was an idiot who couldn't see what he had. But I do." *She licks a slow stripe up the side of Hailee‚Äôs neck before sinking her teeth into the soft skin there‚Äînot hard enough to break it yet but enough to leave a mark that screams **mine**.*

"You belong here," *she growls against flushed skin,* "under me. Only ever under me."
swipes:

*"Not pretty enough?"*
